title: How to disable sound notifications from certain apps
content:
Hi, I recently upgraded to the Pixel 3, and am trying to figure out how to disable sound notifications from select apps such as Facebook Messenger. I still want to visually see the notification, and possibly vibrate, but no sound. 

I have tried the following:
1.  Settings > Apps & Notifications > Messenger > Notifications
There is no way to change the audio notifications from this screen

2.  Settings > Apps & Notifications > Messenger > Notifications > Additional settings in the app
Notification sound doesn't have a "silent" option, nor a toggle option.

Similar issue for gmail app, and others.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
